com.yantra.interop.japi

Interface YIFErrorSequenceUE


  • public interface YIFErrorSequenceUE

    This interface is invoked for each asynchronous service with a receiver. It is enabled by checking the "Check for Prior Exception" flag and specifying the implementing class in prior errors user exit. When this class is invoked it is passed to the document that the Receiver Component (like Database, MQJMS and so forth.) receives. The following two methods are defined in this interface:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getExceptionGroupReference(org.w3c.dom.Document document, java.lang.String apiName)
      This method is invoked by the infrastructure.
      void setExceptionGroupFinder(YIFExceptionGroupFinder finder)
      This can be written to be the finder of the ExceptionGroupReference.

    • Method Detail

      • getExceptionGroupReference

        org.w3c.dom.Document getExceptionGroupReference(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                                java.lang.String apiName)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is invoked by the infrastructure. It is expected to return a document as follows: 

            <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
    <Order ExceptionGroupReferenceExists="N" OrderHeaderKey="2004080914385146615" 
    ExceptionGroupReference="something" />
        ExceptionGroupReference specifies how a particular message should be classified if in case there is a reprocessible exception.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setExceptionGroupFinder

        void setExceptionGroupFinder(YIFExceptionGroupFinder finder)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This can be written to be the finder of the ExceptionGroupReference. The following sample code explains it clearly : 
                package custom.UE ;
        import com.yantra.interop.japi.YIFErrorSequenceUE ;
        import com.yantra.interop.japi.YIFExceptionGroupFinder ;
        import com.yantra.yfc.dom.YFCDocument ;
        import org.w3c.dom.Document ;
        public class CustomErrorSequenceImpl implements YIFErrorSequenceUE
        {
                private YIFExceptionGroupFinder finder = null ;
                public void setExceptionGroupFinder(YIFExceptionGroupFinder finder)
                {
                        this.finder = finder ;
                }
                public Document getExceptionGroupReference(Document inDoc, 
                              String transactionName) throws Exception
                {
                System.out.println ( "Input Doc is " + 
                        YFCDocument.getDocumentFor ( inDoc ).getString() ) ;
                        Document outDoc = finder.findExistingError( inDoc ) ;
                        System.out.println ( "Output Doc is " + 
                                YFCDocument.getDocumentFor ( outDoc ).getString() ) ;
                
                        return outDoc ;
                }
         }
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
